bow: mommit how do you when you are done my husband and have wonderful child not yet year old every day struggle with whether or not we should have any more children could rattle pros and cons off find having one child 16 months exhausting but know ve got to be really keen on the idea of doubling the amount of chaos around here do think this is the case sure as hell made list of pros cons when thinking about having another kid and then my hormones got the better of me and brewing another one now sorry op have no idea how to tell when you re done but if ever get there ll be sure to let you know after the test showed positive with my first one knew the day tried watching someone else kid and mine at the same time felt like had worked my very first hour retail shift and knew that physically not capable of doing two at once so am leaving the door open to adopting an older kid in the future but will not spend another year of sleeplessness and then try to take care of two kids just do have it in me my plan was to not have two in diapers got twins so that did really work for me we re done now have no interest in more kids believe we are one and done family we both believe that both parents need to be pro baby for another one we are think about pregnancy and realize that if get so tired rearing our year old un pregnant would want to do it pregnant we can provide well for the one we have if we had another we could provide but it would get lot tougher to make those dollars stretch had dream where had positive pregnancy test and it induced panic in said dream agree with the other responses if you are trying to decide via list of pros and cons do do it it closer to matter of the heart keep your pros cons list and if you ever look at it and think none of these things matters on either side then start talking to your partner about possibly going for another one oh man know this feeling but also do not want an only child no disrespect for only children here just personally do not want an only child so one day will be up for this again also ca imagine never doing this again as hard as it is and have ppd and old well oldish for first baby compared to all my friends from my hometown can you see the pros falling out of my pockets here :*grin* amazing even myself because last night was great one anyway that said not ready yet do think can do two in diapers or if do one will have to be nearly out think three year age gap would be okay my son is fairly mellow not counting on that with future in fact kind of counting on my personality coming next because that would make sense think the name of the game will be support support support support know lot more now so there is that funnily enough though always imagined myself to be the type of person who would have kids not but think we re probably going to stop at never imagined would have this much difficulty have my teaching degree love kids how is it that could not manage my own well my ppd manifested as hyper attachment through anxiety omg is he breathing omg ca leave him and so forth that kind of anxiety is pretty consuming still would do it again want him to have sibling relationship want to experience pregnancy again birth again baby again already this is going too fast do want my husband and to be just obligation when we re old not that plan on being an obligation but you know knew because my body told me so yay me no if could have just one more have girls would have but nope body said nah no more for you sorry know not the answer you are looking for good luck on whatever you decide ve been wondering the same thing have year old and month old ve been going back and forth but we re probably done would love to have more kids but during my 1st pregnancy went on bed rest at 28 weeks and still delivered at 35 weeks after some time in the hospital on bedrest there my 2nd pregnancy had lot of the same problems and was put on strict bedrest at 30 weeks when my mil moved in with us to help take care of the toddler and teenagers my step sons decided that pregnancy did agree with me and scheduled my husband for vasectomy if you do know if you re done do do anything permanent some days wish he had had it done and some days get really depressed about it but love my kids and suck at pregnancy so that how know we re done we stopped at because most tables at restaurants have chairs that was the only reason of course but the world does seem tailored to kid families and going beyond that would be expensive and inconvenient just knew when was pregnant with my first knew wanted more and that did not change even during all the sleepless nights got pregnant with number two and knew was not done yet at soon as got the positive test with number felt done do yearn when holding newborn baby just feel happy and complete and know we are done knew we were done when we looked at whether or not we could reasonably afford to support another child emotionally and economically and still offer decent quality of life to the children we already have emotionally would love to have more children but am not entirely sure have the stamina for it economically at this point it would be fair to the kids we have because we ca support more children without our current kids having to make what we see as unreasonable sacrifices so we re done same here twins done that and the horrible life threatening pregnancy is something never want to go through again think it something you just *know* after my first my husband and considered ourselves one and done type family my oldest was difficult baby preemie colic milk and soy allergy and later on encephalitis so we felt like we had enough on our plates but at some point our minds just changed my husband started pointing out larger families at the mall or talking about how great it would he for our son to have sibling and realized did mind sleepless nights and piles of diapers *that* much anyway baby number two opened flood gate apparently we realized how much we love being parents for us it just works baby number is 10 weeks old now and hubby is already talking about trying for the girl think we both have it in our heads that we will go for four and the truth is that even though it wo happen anytime soon my plate is full right now there is part of me that just feels like we are not complete yet my plan is to stop at four because anything more seems like too much to us but who knows guess my pregnancies are also high risk so that part is stressful but find that each child is little easier than the one before sure this is side effect of experience and more confidence in child rearing when my husband and realized that we have been wiping someone else ass for almost six years now and we need bigger car to have another kid ca fit three carseats in the back of mazda3 do want bigger car originally wanted three and my husband only wanted two he one of three boys and said was too many succumbed because we both agreed that if we did not feel complete with two we could always adopt in the future we also had our children as close together as possible because we knew we only wanted two we have an 18 month old and our son is due in february had dream pregnancy with my daughter but had attachment issues and some ppd this pregnancy has been far from ideal and just feel secure with two think can be the best mom to two children relax you do have to decide right now babies are hard so we decided not to even discuss it until our first was two now my younger one is five and we re tentatively considering third that was never in the official plan take it slow you ll know when you re ready if ever always wanted two kids but then after having my son we have decided to have only the one just do have the aching womb that some moms get when they are around babies just remember the sleepless nights horrible mood swings not feeling that my body was mine etc etc etc and just do want to do it did have bad pregnancy or anything it just was the awesome amazing thing that everyone who loved being pregnant experienced do get me wrong love my son and love watching him grow and learn just do feel like doing it all over again plus 36 and do want to be almost 40 when we have the second since it would be planned because my son was surprise baby my husband and agreed to not make the decision for the first year after our daughter was born had had section and 6mo worth of ppd after that always assumed we have two but the more we talked about it twin and hubby is the middle child of the more we wanted to keep it just the three of us we get lot of flak about it but it the right decision for us we were in the mindset of having kids and possibly 3rd we knew for sure that we wanted siblings after our first and she was rough for us though not nearly as tough as other folks have it for sure but she certainly pushed us to our limits at times we still were adamant about having sibling for her our second was by far fantastic baby and now at 19 months is still very good of course there the biting that he finally grown out of but hair pulling and pinching is still big we had our two and was open for third but was necessary my husband on the other hand was so happy to have pleasant child that the fear of having third which had the potential to be like our first and did want to ruin the niceness of our second we decided against any more he had vasectomy little early for my taste but he was really set on no more kids now seeing other folks having their first or second kids now and not regretting our decision one bit it really nice knowing we wo have to start all over again and can really work on having fun with the kids edit our kids were yrs and months apart want to have one more child and get sterilized because have lot of problems with using any kind of birth control and do want the risk of pregnancy looming over my head for the rest of my life my husband never has given me concrete answer on how many kids he wants which is annoying is it awesome that we get to choose wanted fourth was pregnant with fourth miscarried after really thinking about it we realized our youngest is nearly done with diapers all three sleep through the night at this point my middle child is starting kindergarten next year which means ll have kids to wrangle to do homework after school another year after that and ll have three we re moving along and it perfect just the way it is still miss and wish our fourth pregnancy had succeeded sometimes still have twinges of want how can convince husband we should have just one more but my logical rational side kicks in and says we are enough these are my feeling exactly ca stand the idea of going through that exhausting first year again this time with another child to care for just ca do it would love for my son to have sibling but am not having another child just so he can have playmate do have the patience and will to do it have one now and knew even before that wanted at least grew up with two other brothers and as much as we bickered we also had many good times and are close as adults my mom said she was ok with two but knew for sure she was done after my youngest brother was born lol sorry little bro we were so exhausted for months before my baby started doing better it was worth it when having another child became fear while pregnant with started to worry about how hard that would be physically due to pregnancies getting harder financially we can handle but fifth would put us in debt emotionally want more want lots of kids but at this point done having them myself and when we are financially ready we will become foster and or adoptive parents and add to our family that way there wakings give it year or two when your little one is out of diapers and more independent you may feel that desire to add to your family or you may be so thrilled to be done with diapers that you may
